overview: The best part of marrying a MILF is that sometimes they have a super hot daughter! These teen girls are tired of living in their hot mom's shadow & they're ready to prove that they are old enough to satisfy a man. In these all-new episodes from Teenfidelity, we live the fantasy of fucking sexy, young step-daughters while putting them to the test to find out if they really are Better Than Mom!
title: Better Than Mom
